item.title: Deep Learning for Crisis Computing
item.description: About This repository will host Python implementation of a number of deep neural networks classifiers for the classification of crisis-related data on Twitter. Requirementes: python 2.7 numpy, scikit-learn keras, tensorflow or theano backend Dataset and Pre-process A sample of tweet data (data/sample.csv) is a .csv format with three columns First, we need to pre-process tweets data: remove urls, special characters, lowercasingâ€¦ - python data_helpers/preprocess.py data/sample.csv Split pre-processed data (data/sample_prccd.
